info.title: Klaviyo API (Beta)
info.description: The Klaviyo REST API. Please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com for more details.

get.description:
Get all coupons in an account.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `75/s`
Steady: `700/m` **Scopes:** `coupons:read`

Get a specific coupon with the given coupon ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `75/s`
Steady: `700/m` **Scopes:** `coupons:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

schema.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

schema.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

delete.description:
Delete the coupon with the given coupon ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `coupons:write`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

schema.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

get.description:
Gets a list of coupon codes associated with a coupon/coupons or a profile/profiles. A coupon/coupons or a profile/profiles must be provided as required filter params.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `350/s`
Steady: `3500/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2023-08-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`expires_at`: `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`status`: `equals`
`coupon.id`: `any`, `equals`
`profile.id`: `any`, `equals`

post.description:
Synchronously creates a coupon code for the given coupon.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `350/s`
Steady: `3500/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:write`

get.description:
Returns a Coupon Code specified by the given identifier.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `350/s`
Steady: `3500/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

schema.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

patch.description:
Updates a coupon code specified by the given identifier synchronously. We allow updating the 'status' and 'expiration_date' of coupon codes.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `350/s`
Steady: `3500/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:write`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

schema.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

get.summary: Get Coupon Code Bulk Create Jobs
get.description:
Get all coupon code bulk create jobs. Returns a maximum of 100 jobs per request.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `75/s`
Steady: `700/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2023-08-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`status`: `equals`

post.summary: Spawn Coupon Code Bulk Create Job
post.description:
Create a coupon-code-bulk-create-job to bulk create a list of coupon codes. Max number of jobs queued at once we allow for is 100.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `75/s`
Steady: `700/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:write`

get.summary: Get Coupon Code Bulk Create Job
get.description:
Get a coupon code bulk create job with the given job ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `75/s`
Steady: `700/m` **Scopes:** `coupon-codes:read`

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of the job to retrieve.

schema.description: ID of the job to retrieve.

id.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

external_id.description: This is the id that is stored in an integration such as Shopify or Magento.
external_id.example: This is the id that is stored in an integration such as Shopify or Magento.

id.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

unique_code.description: This is a unique string that will be or is assigned to each customer/profile and is associated with a coupon.

expires_at.description: The datetime when this coupon code will expire. Can be used as an optional filter when getting coupon codes.

status.description: The current status of the coupon code.

pointer.description: A pointer to the source of the error in the request payload.

code.description: A code for classifying the error type.

title.description: A high-level message about the error.

detail.example: The payload provided in the request is invalid.

source.description: Additional information on the source of the error.

job_id.description: Unique identifier for retrieving the job. Generated by Klaviyo.

created_at.description: The date and time the job was created in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

total_count.description: The total number of operations to be processed by the job. See `completed_count` for the job's current progress.

completed_count.description: The total number of operations that have been completed by the job.

failed_count.description: The total number of operations that have failed as part of the job.

completed_at.description: Date and time the job was completed in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

errors.description: Array of errors encountered during the processing of the job.

expires_at.description: Date and time the job expires in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

external_id.description: This is the id that is stored in an integration such as Shopify or Magento.

id.description: The internal id of a Coupon is equivalent to its external id stored within an integration.

external_id.description: This is the id that is stored in an integration such as Shopify or Magento.
external_id.example: This is the id that is stored in an integration such as Shopify or Magento.

unique_code.description: This is a unique string that will be or is assigned to each customer/profile and is associated with a coupon.

expires_at.description: The datetime when this coupon code will expire. Can be used as an optional filter when getting coupon codes.

id.description: The id of a coupon code is a combination of its unique code and the id of the coupon it is associated with.

unique_code.description: This is a unique string that will be or is assigned to each customer/profile and is associated with a coupon.

expires_at.description: The datetime when this coupon code will expire. Can be used as an optional filter when getting coupon codes.

status.description: The current status of the coupon code.

coupon-codes.description: Array of coupon codes to create.

job_id.description: Unique identifier for retrieving the job. Generated by Klaviyo.

created_at.description: The date and time the job was created in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

total_count.description: The total number of operations to be processed by the job. See `completed_count` for the job's current progress.

completed_count.description: The total number of operations that have been completed by the job.

failed_count.description: The total number of operations that have failed as part of the job.

completed_at.description: Date and time the job was completed in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

errors.description: Array of errors encountered during the processing of the job.

expires_at.description: Date and time the job expires in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm).

Klaviyo-API-Key.name: Authorization
Klaviyo-API-Key.description:
Private key authentication for /api/ endpoints is performed by setting the `Authorization` header to `Klaviyo-API-Key your-private-api-key`
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2023-08-15.pre/reference/api-overview#authentication
